Html:
Hi,

today I started WSUS Package Publisher. Everything works, but my updates are no longer displayed.

cvetters wrote:
today I started WSUS Package Publisher. Everything works, but my updates are no longer displayed.
Did you connect to the WSUS? What you have selected in Tools > Settings > Servers > [X] Connect to local Server. Is the port correct?

Yes, I already set Java, Firefox and Adobe Reader to install it.

But I cannot see them anymore

OK, next try.

Tools > Settings > Updates > [X] Show locally published Updates that are also visible in WSUS-Console.
Misc. > [X] Whenn starting, connect to the last used server.
Are WPP direct on the WSUS?

Okay thank you, I will try it in 2 weeks.

Yes wpp is direct on the server
